column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I'm sure if you are into art you will love this place. If you don't
column2: it still has al ot to appreciate. To be honest
column3: I've never gone here because I wanted to
column4: other then I didn't want to be left behind on a field trip day. There is a wide variety of paintings
column6: and misc. "art" to see. It would be a great date idea if you want to look sophisticated.
